name: Midas' Punch
description:
Synopsis

You are a lucky adventurer who came upon a magical armor set that drops precious gold coins upon being struck. Your days of slaying monsters have come to an end, for now your endeavors involve getting hit by them in order to build your wealth at a rate no other adventurer could ever dream of.
Use your newly earned coins to enhance your character and increase your wealth exponentially, though stay aware of who you let yourself be attacked by, for being too greedy will lead you to your demise!

Credits

Programming by Maximiliano Moscoso

Music and Sound Design by Gonzalo Cabeza

Visual Art and Graphic Design by Ilona Odilia

Made in under 48 hours for the Global StartupCities Game Jam. The event's theme me was "A Win-Win Situation"


Font name: Pixel Sans Font
